name: part_010
file: tmp_【 #らでん生誕祭2025 】初！生誕ライブ～ここで出会ったのもなにかのご縁～【儒烏風亭らでん #ReGLOSS 】 [f5QgEZjH53Y]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: Continuation of the performance of 'Astro Note' by the members of Hololive's ReGLOSS.
A brief interlude with a black screen before the next song begins.
Juufuutei Raden begins a solo performance of the song 'STAR TRAIN'.

subtitles.original: はいはいでグッバイでバイバイ
subtitles.english: Bye-bye with a high-high and a goodbye

subtitles.original: アストロノート
subtitles.english: Astronaut

subtitles.original: 話を聞いてほしいな
subtitles.english: I want you to hear my story

subtitles.original: 君からしたら平穏なことだろうけど
subtitles.english: It might seem peaceful to you, but...

subtitles.original: メッセージは手書きにしてよ
subtitles.english: Please write the message by hand

subtitles.original: 言葉は宙に浮いてしまうから
subtitles.english: Because words tend to float away into space

subtitles.original: 形に残る方が綺麗だから
subtitles.english: Because things that take shape are more beautiful

subtitles.original: まだまだ行こう
subtitles.english: Let's keep going further

subtitles.original: 現在の視界は良好
subtitles.english: Current visibility is clear

subtitles.original: 自由落下の
subtitles.english: Our journey of

subtitles.original: 旅を続けよう
subtitles.english: free fall continues

subtitles.original: ひとりぼっちで
subtitles.english: The two of us alone

subtitles.original: ヘルツを合わせた二人
subtitles.english: our frequencies aligned

subtitles.original: それって幸せだ
subtitles.english: That's what happiness is

subtitles.original: バイバイでグッバイでバイバイ いつか会う日まで
subtitles.english: Bye-bye with a goodbye, until the day we meet again

subtitles.original: それまで残る僕らの魔法 イェイイェー
subtitles.english: Until then, our magic remains, yeah yeah

subtitles.original: 会いたい反対の反対 そこが終点だ
subtitles.english: The opposite of the opposite of 'I want to see you,' that's the end point

subtitles.original: いまだに僕ら歌っている イェイイェー
subtitles.english: We are still singing even now, yeah yeah

subtitles.original: たいしたこともないのに
subtitles.english: Even though it's nothing important

subtitles.original: 笑えてしまうことがある
subtitles.english: sometimes we just end up laughing

subtitles.original: きっと、そんなんでいいのさ
subtitles.english: I'm sure that's just fine

subtitles.original: 別れは青かった
subtitles.english: Our parting was green

subtitles.original: メッセージは言葉にしてよ
subtitles.english: Please put the message into words

subtitles.original: 君の声を覚えていたいから
subtitles.english: Because I want to remember your voice

subtitles.original: 形のあるものは有限だから
subtitles.english: Because physical things are finite

subtitles.original: どこまで行こうかなんて言いながらさ
subtitles.english: While saying things like, "I wonder how far we should go?"

subtitles.original: 僕らみな分かっていた 岐路に立ってしまうこと
subtitles.english: We all knew that we would eventually reach a crossroads

subtitles.original: ひとりぼっちと分かれ道は似てるけど
subtitles.english: Being alone and a fork in the road are similar

subtitles.original: また交わるから
subtitles.english: but we'll meet again

subtitles.original: バイバイでグッバイでバイバイ 全て群青だ
subtitles.english: Bye-bye with a goodbye, everything is ultramarine

subtitles.original: 駆け抜けてから思い知った幼さ
subtitles.english: The childishness I realized after running through it all

subtitles.original: バイバイ反対の反対 そこが終点だ
subtitles.english: Bye-bye, opposite of the opposite, that's the end point

subtitles.original: いずれ、僕らにも訪れるだろうから
subtitles.english: Because it will eventually come for us as well

subtitles.original: 孤独な旅が続いていく
subtitles.english: A lonely journey continues

subtitles.original: 周回軌道で出会えた僕らは逸れるだろう
subtitles.english: We who met in orbit will likely drift apart

subtitles.original: 声が変わって 背が高くなって
subtitles.english: Even if our voices change, we grow taller

subtitles.original: 見えるものしか信じなくなっても
subtitles.english: and we only believe what we can see

subtitles.original: 夢を語るんだろう
subtitles.english: we'll probably still talk about our dreams

subtitles.original: 中身のない話も素敵だから
subtitles.english: Because even empty conversations are wonderful

subtitles.original: まだまだ行こう
subtitles.english: Let's keep going

subtitles.original: 一人で行こう
subtitles.english: Let's go alone

subtitles.original: バイバイでグッバイ Days
subtitles.english: Bye-bye with a goodbye Days

subtitles.original: バイバイでグッバイでバイバイ これでサヨナラだ
subtitles.english: Bye-bye with a goodbye, this is goodbye

subtitles.original: ついに解ける僕らの魔法
subtitles.english: Our magic is finally breaking

subtitles.original: 会いたい反対は会いたい それでいいんだよ
subtitles.english: The opposite of 'I want to see you' is 'I want to see you,' and that's okay

subtitles.original: 退屈さえも愛していた イェイイェー
subtitles.english: I even loved the boredom, yeah yeah

subtitles.original: たいしたこともないのに
subtitles.english: Even though it's nothing important

subtitles.original: ずっと笑えてしまう日々のこと
subtitles.english: the days that always made me laugh

subtitles.original: そっとしまっておくのさ
subtitles.english: I'll gently tuck them away

subtitles.original: 僕らは青かった
subtitles.english: We were so young

subtitles.original: 手探りで夢を見る
subtitles.english: Groping for dreams

subtitles.original: 何もない ただ信じて
subtitles.english: There's nothing there, just believe

subtitles.original: 宇宙までが遠いほど
subtitles.english: The further away the heavens are

subtitles.original: 片道切符を求めて
subtitles.english: Searching for a one-way ticket

subtitles.original: Wow...
subtitles.english: Wow...
